short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight words you don't want to use in social media post composers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you have a hard time removing words from your vocabulary? SwearJar will help you remember!

If you're editing a post or comment reply, and you write one of the words you've told it you want to stop using, it will turn the composer box red (or any other color you choose) and optionally make an alert sound.

It doesn't come with any words pre-loaded, the list is entirely up to you. It works on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and Instagram.
